none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2012-08-lifeform/extracted/lifeform/06 Wag Our Tails For No One

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 06, 2012 Description from Terminal Escape:
Flanged bass, comically shouted vocals and high end guitar distorted to oblivion all set to cartoon 1-2-1-2 drums, this is noise punk in the most elementary WANKYS tradition. Yeah, it rules. LIFEFORM
